titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules-Crosse the second day of Iune, being the last Sunday in Easter terme. 1622. By Thomas Ailesbury student in diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Ailesbury, Thomas, fl. 1622-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Eld for Leonard Becket and Robert Wilson, and are to be sold neere the Temple Church, and at Graies Inne new Gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Pauls-Crosse.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
